dcterms:description: IEMOCAP is an interactive emotional dyadic motion capture database that provides a comprehensive dataset for emotion recognition in dyadic dialogue.

dcterms:description: MELD is a multimodal multi-party dataset designed for emotion recognition in conversations, providing a rich dataset for emotion inference tasks.

dcterms:description: EmoryNLP is a dataset for emotion detection on TV show transcripts, utilizing sequence-based convolutional neural networks for emotion recognition.
dcterms:title: EmoryNLP
